alert.note: Alert for Southwest Highlands (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 12:36PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Owyhee County through 115 PM MDT... At 1236 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gedney Butte, or 39 miles north of Owyhee, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Gedney Butte, Grasmere, Blackstone Reservoir and Monument Butte around 110 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
